key_phrases.phrase: Have you ever been here before?
examples: Welcome! Have you ever been here before?
Have you ever been here before, or is this your first visit?
Thank you for calling. Have you ever been here before?

key_phrases.phrase: Yes, it is my first time.
examples: Yes, it is my first time at this salon.
Yes, it is my first time. A friend recommended you.
Yes, it is my first time. I'm excited to try your services.

key_phrases.phrase: No, it is my second time.
examples: No, it is my second time. I came last month.
No, it is my second time here. I loved the service last time.
No, it is my second time. I had a great experience before.
Oh, welcome back! When were you here before?
When were you here before? I'll check your records.
When were you here before? Let me pull up your information.

key_phrases.phrase: Welcome! Let me show you around.
examples: Welcome! Let me show you around our salon.
It's your first time? Welcome! Let me show you around.
Welcome! Let me show you around and explain our services.
